entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:26 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
